message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Momentum tilted positive in midcaps (power/financials led). Breakout-type closes in TORNTPOWER, ABCAPITAL, LTF, FORTIS; consolidations in BEL/IDBI/NYKAA. Our book is steady (HINDCOPPER leading); no emergency buys—focus on risk control and pullback entries.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "ABCAPITAL", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Strong close near day high with higher volume; round-number resistance at 300—enter on strength above it.", "price": 301.00},
    {"symbol": "TORNTPOWER", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Wide-range green candle closing near high; continuation likely if price clears today's high.", "price": 1288.00},
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Buy on retest", "reason": "High-volume up day closing near high; look for dip/retest of 261–263 zone to enter with defined risk.", "price": 262.00},
    {"symbol": "FORTIS", "signal": "Buy breakout", "reason": "Range expansion; trigger above intraday high to avoid false breaks.", "price": 1104.00},
    {"symbol": "HDFCAMC", "signal": "Buy momentum", "reason": "Strong follow-through and rising volume; momentum entry on strength.", "price": 5685.00},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Add on dip (existing holding)", "reason": "Defended 406–407 intraday; small add only if it revisits support and holds.", "price": 407.00},
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "signal": "Trim/Trail (existing holding)", "reason": "Up ~9% from cost; near intraday resistance ~348; book partial to de-risk and trail remainder.", "price": 348.00},
    {"symbol": "TATACOMM", "signal": "Risk control", "reason": "Closed near lower end of range; protect capital with stop below today’s low.", "price": 1765.00}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "HINDCOPPER", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Book partial profits near resistance to de-risk while trend remains intact.", "quantity": 5, "price": 348.00},
    {"symbol": "TATACOMM", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Stop-loss below today’s low to avoid deeper drawdown if weakness extends.", "quantity": 1, "price": 1765.00}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 2138.20,
    "total_value": 25587.00,
    "holdings_count": 7,
    "holdings": [
      "HINDCOPPER: 25 units @ 312.00 (Current 340.80)",
      "BEL: 8 units @ 412.65 (Current 409.40)",
      "BSE: 1 unit @ 2385.00 (Current 2476.00)",
      "TATACOMM: 1 unit @ 1870.20 (Current 1798.20)",
      "RBLBANK: 10 units @ 291.60 (Current 290.00)",
      "IDBI: 20 units @ 93.46 (Current 93.23)",
      "NYKAA: 10 units @ 265.19 (Current 261.48)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "ABCAPITAL: Strong momentum; watch sustained breakout above 300 with volume.",
    "TORNTPOWER: Breakout day; continuation likely >1288; dips to 1250–1265 can be buyable.",
    "LTF: High-volume surge; preferred buy zone 261–263 with stop under 257.",
    "FORTIS: Range expansion; trigger >1103; manage risk below 1075.",
    "BSE: Strong session; add only on pullbacks to 2430–2450; trail if closes <2385.",
    "BEL: Support 406–407; weakness if closes <406; strength back above 414.",
    "HINDCOPPER: Momentum intact; resistance 348–350; trail stop ~332 after partial profit.",
    "TATACOMM: Support 1786; loss of this level opens 1750; keep stop discipline.",
    "IDBI: Tight range 92.4–93.7; momentum trigger above 94.2; buy-the-dip near 92.5 only if it holds.",
    "RBLBANK: Demand near 286; short-term breakout above 296 could open 305–310.",
    "NYKAA: Sideways 260–267; structure improves on close >268 with volume.",
    "WAAREEENER: Trend strong; avoid chasing; better risk-reward on pullback to 3350–3370.",
    "MCX: Momentum strong; continuation above 8988; pricey for our capital but good watch.",
    "KEI: Trend up; buyable on dips to 4250–4270 with tight stops.",
    "KAYNES: Volatile pullback; reclaiming and holding >6900 would improve setup.",
    "GAIL/NHPC: Steady bids; constructive above 180 and 86 respectively.",
    "CHOLAFIN: Strong close; watch 1652 breakout follow-through with risk under 1610."
  ]
}
